page.description: To print a script or function:

step.description: Display the Code tab of the Control Panel.
Select Code > Print... to display the Print Scripts and Functions dialog.
Optionally, click Scripts or Functions to limit your selection.
Optionally, click Print Selected... to display the Select Scripts and Functions dialog box.

case.description: 1. Place checkmarks to the left of scripts and functions that you want to print.
2. Optionally, click Select All or Un-Select All to speed your selection process.
3. Click OK to print or Cancel to quit without action.

see.ref: Exporting and Importing Scripts and Functions
